title: I Will Quit the Entourage of the Villainess - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Age Progression   Beautiful Female Lead   European Ambience   Fat to Fit   Female Protagonist   Mob Protagonist   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Otome Game   Reincarnated in a Game World   Villainess Noble Girls
author: Hoshimado Ponkichi   ぽんきち   星窓ぽんきち
description:
When I noticed, I was a Villainess, Follower B!

Huh? Isn’t this the world of the game my daughter played before?!

Suddenly, I, the Earl’s daughter Cosette, regained my memories of a previous life and was appalled by my mildly grand fatty body type and started dieting.

Using the skills I’ve cultivated continuously in my previous life as a old woman, today Cosette will push forward!>
